reviewText:
Movie stars Dharmendra, Asha Parekh, Nazima, Sulochna, Balraj Sahni and Rajindernath in lead roles. The old hindi bollywood movie is a romantic love story with spice of betrays and emotions. Movie starts showing Ravi, who is an eligible bachelor, who lives with his mother. The whereabouts of his dad are unknown. He meets with beautiful Kanchan and both fall in love. But fate has other plans for them, as Ravi soon finds out that Kanchan is already married and has a child. Thus this shock hurts him at heart. Movie is nice and was a Box Office hit. It won several awards and was was popular. Overall, the movie is good to enjoy weekend.
Music of the movie is given by the finest duet Laxmikant Pyarelal. Songs are awesome and are well sung by Mohammed Rafi, Lata Mangeshkar and Asha Bhosle.
